name: Compare
overview: A popular Markt & Technik puzzle game created by Andreas Steinmann that spawned a sequel. A logic puzzle where you need to match the setup on right by adding numbers on the left. Each space you click in will get a 1, if there are numbers next to it, all of them will be incremented up by one. So if you were to put a one next to they one you just created, it would become two! Determine how to best place your first tiles to have success in the end and a perfect comparison to the image on the right!
